entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 15. POP 40%
